meanings.definition: To ski downhill using a series of quick turns.
meanings.sent1: She wedels down the snowy slope with skill.
meanings.sent2: The skier wedels gracefully down the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The bunny tried to wedels down the hill but ended up in a snowdrift.
meanings.sent4: Her movements on the slope were like a dancer wedels across the stage.
meanings.sent5: The instructor demonstrated how to wedels smoothly on the icy terrain.

meanings.definition: The act of skiing downhill using a series of quick turns.
meanings.sent1: His wedels down the slope were impressive.
meanings.sent2: The competition showcases the best wedels in the region.
meanings.sent3: The bunny slope was full of beginners attempting their first wedels.
meanings.sent4: The wedels of the expert skier were poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The sound of wedels echoed through the snowy valley.
